about_the_game:
by Nyerges Design


IATA: IST, ICAO: LTFM
Istanbul Airport is the main airport for Istanbul, Turkey. It was opened to the public in 2018. In 2019, all commercial passenger flights were transferred here from Istanbul Atatürk Airport. Now it can handle 200 million passengers a year. There are some hubs as well, like the hub of Onur Air, Turkish Airlines and Turkish Cargo as well.



It has 5 asphalt runways. The lenghts are ranging between 10,039 ft and 13,451ft. There is an enormous terminal, sectioned to 5 concourses: A, B, D, F and G. Concourse G is reserved mostly for domestic flights.

The airport is developed by Nyerges Design exclusively for Tower3D Pro and Tower3D. This airport is a nice addition if you're looking for more challenge and a new airport to test your control skills. You will need  Tower!3D or Tower!3D Pro installed on your PC to play with this add-on.

    [Detailed graphic design3D modelled airport buildingsDynamic lighting and shadows, day-night cycles provide a stunning visual experienceLive airport with service cars for airplanes and vehicle traffic around the airports]
